title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 24 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 24 2022
description:
NYC Councilman Joe Borelli joins C&B to blast Mayor Adams for lifting the vax mandate for professional athletes and entertainers, but not the general public, including thousands who were fired. Alcohol killed more people under 65 than covid in 2020. Old photos of Clay and Buck coming soon to ClayAndBuck.com? Biden brings up Trump, Jan 6. at NATO presser. Stunning viral video moment of truck caught in Texas tornado.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
